attributes.action: Create a Homes for Palestian Refugee Scheme Like The UK did for Ukraine!
attributes.additional_details: The UK Government has the ability to do so and did this exact scheme when there was a war in Ukraine and the innocent civilians had no where to go. This is the exact same situation and the only thing that is different is the colour of their skin.
attributes.background: We would like Palestinian refugees whose families have been killed in Gaza and have no where to go, to come to the UK, under the same scheme that Ukrainians were offered. This is the exact same situation and the only thing that is different is the colour of their skin.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648734
